questions.question: Can you combine the following two statements into one?
In which header file is the NULL macro defined?
questions.answerDescription: The macro "NULL" is defined in locale.h, stddef.h, stdio.h, stdlib.h, string.h, time.h, and wchar.h.

questions.question: How many bytes are occupied by near, far and huge pointers (DOS)?
questions.answerDescription: near=2, far=4 and huge=4 pointers exist only under DOS. Under windows and Linux every pointers is 4 bytes long.

questions.question: If a variable is a pointer to a structure, then which of the following operator is used to access data members of the structure through the pointer variable?
What would be the equivalent pointer expression for referring the array element a[i][j][k][l]
A pointer is
options: A keyword used to create variables
A variable that stores address of an instruction
A variable that stores address of other variable
answers: A variable that stores address of other variable
